section.title: Fair XLS Import and Export Overview
Exporting Functionality

warning.para: The functionality described in this chapter is provided on an interim basis only. It will be depreciated in the future when the Tracker reporting infrastructure is implemented.

section.para: Premises Document Export Functionality is provided by utilities that are called from the main Tracker Editor menu.
